summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Jyotish-AI frontend integration with Astrolok backend. All core functionality working successfully including authentication, dashboard, navigation, and data display.

flaky_endpoints.impact: Chat functionality may not work properly

passed_tests: Chart bundle API returning valid data
Login page displays correctly with email/password fields
Demo login button works and logs in successfully
Dashboard displays with Natal Chart after login
Navigation works between Charts, Dashas, Yogas, Chat tabs
Yogas page shows 10 yoga cards with backend data
Dashas page displays Mahadasha timeline with planetary periods
Chat page displays with input field and AI interface
success_percentage: Backend: 80% (8/10 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (9/9 tests passed)
